# cmccloudv2_server (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ip_address` (String) Filter by ip address of server
- `name` (String)
- `server_id` (String) Id of the server
- `status` (String) filter by server status (case-insensitive)
- `vm_state` (String) filter by vm_state (case-insensitive)
- `zone` (String) filter by server zone that contains this text (case-insensitive)

### Read-Only

- `cpu` (Number)
- `created_at` (String)
- `flavor_name` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ram` (Number)
